Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking unparalleled performance and luxury. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $12000 to you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value for your investment while enjoying the superior quality and functionality of our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this remarkable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
